name: io.github.Ansvar-Systems/automotive-cybersecurity
description: Automotive cybersecurity: R155/R156 regulations, ISO 21434, TISAX, AUTOSAR, Chinese GB/T

tools.name: list_sources
tools.description: List available automotive cybersecurity regulations and standards. Call this first to discover available sources. Returns empty array if no sources match the filter.

tools.name: get_requirement
tools.description: Retrieve a specific regulation article or standard clause. Returns full text for regulations; guidance only for standards (full text requires paid license). Returns error if source/reference not found.

tools.name: search_requirements
tools.description: Full-text search across all regulations and standards using FTS5 with BM25 ranking. Returns empty array for no matches. Maximum 100 results per query.

tools.name: list_work_products
tools.description: List ISO 21434 work products (deliverables) by clause or lifecycle phase. Returns all work products if no filters specified.

tools.name: export_compliance_matrix
tools.description: Generate compliance traceability matrix in Markdown or CSV format. Large output â€” use for audit documentation, not individual lookups.

tools.name: about
tools.description: Server metadata, dataset statistics, freshness, and provenance. No input parameters needed.

remoteInstructions: This server provides comprehensive automotive cybersecurity compliance data. Use list_sources to see available frameworks, search_requirements for keyword queries, get_requirement for specific articles/clauses, list_work_products for ISO 21434 deliverables, and export_compliance_matrix for audit documentation.
